mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (RECEIVABLE, ACTUALPAYMENT, BEGTIME, ENDTIME, PAYMENTTIME, UPDATETIME) VALUES (#{receivable}, #{actualpayment}, #{begtime}, #{endtime}, #{paymenttime}, #{updatetime})
mapper.select: SELECT A.PAYMENT_ID, A.PATIENT_ID, A.PAYSERVICE_ID, A.RECEIVABLE, A.ACTUALPAYMENT, A.BEGTIME, A.ENDTIME, A.PAYMENTTIME, A.UPDATETIME, A.ISUSE,B.NAME PAYSERVICENAME FROM PAYMENT A,PAYSERVICE B WHERE A.PAYSERVICE_ID = B.PAYSERVICE_ID AND A.PATIENT_ID = #{patientId}
